title: Check Perfect Square
description: Checks if a number is a perfect square.
author: sampathvenur
code:
def is_perfect_square(n):
    if n < 0:
        return False
    root = int(n**0.5)
    return root * root == n

# Usage:
is_perfect_square(16) # Returns: True
is_perfect_square(20) # Returns: False
